name: Lie to run!
description:
Play with Jiminy Cricket in this question and answer game.

Run through Pinocchio's nose while answering the questions on the screen.

Keep lying to make Pinocchio's nose grow.

But beware! If you stop lying, Pinocchio's nose will is going to get smaller and you will run out of running platform!


Try to beat your records!

Game for the #CommunityGameJam where the theme is "The Game Is A Liar"
